variables.name: count_of_vm
variables.description: Number: Number of instances to build.

variables.name: linuxvm_base_name
variables.description: String: base name of resources allocated.

variables.name: linuxvm_vm_size
variables.description: String: size of vm to use.

variables.name: linuxvm_create_pip
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to create a public ip for the vm.

variables.description: Boolean: Whether to make the vm an azdo build agent.

variables.name: azdo_agent_version
variables.description: String: Version number of agent software.

variables.name: azdo_pool_name
variables.description: String: name of build agent pool to join.

variables.name: azdo_build_agent_name
variables.description: String: base name of build agents.

variables.name: azdo_environment_demand_name
variables.description: String: Demand/capability of this agent.

variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install the OMS agent in the vm.

variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install sonarqube server in the vm.

variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install AZ cli in the vm.

variables.name: include_nexus
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Nexus Repository in the vm.

variables.name: include_docker
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Docker in the vm.

variables.name: include_pwsh
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install PowerShell for Linux in the vm.

variables.name: include_packer
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Packer in the vm.

variables.name: include_dotnetsdk
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install the .NET SDK in the vm.

variables.name: include_maven
variables.description: Boolean: Whether to install Java and Maven in the vm.
